self_play_instruction:
When two equal tiles collide, they combine to make one tile that displays their sum. As the game progresses, the tiles reach higher and the board gets more crowded. The objective is to reach highest possible score before the board fills up.
'-----------------------------------------
Use buttons below or keyboard. Good luck!
